import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react' import {LinkContainer} from 'react-router-bootstrap' import { ReactLocation, Router } from 'react-location' import {Table,Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import {useDispatch,useSelector} from 'react-redux' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import Message from '../components/Message' import { listUsers } from '../actions/userActions' const UserListScreen = () => { const dispatch=useDispatch() const userList=useSelector(state=>state.userList) const{loading,error,users}=userList useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(listUsers()) },[dispatch]) console.log(users) const deleteHandler=(id)=>{ console.log(id) } return ( <>

Users

{loading?:error?{error} :( {/* fsh */} {users.map(user=>( ))}

{user._id} {user.name} {user.email} {user.isAdmin ?(): ()}
)} ) } export default UserListScreen
